channel.title: Neopets
channel.description: It isn't that bad really, i used to play it before i started runescape and then played a bit more after i quit runescape and if i'm bored i just play the games on the sight if i got nothing better to do. Its a bit of fun to play and it is kinda original i think the only similar game is marapets which doesn't come anywhere near to neopets success.

item.title: Neopets
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I remember making 30-50 dollars a night selling neo points, from cheating of course. 1 million np used to be worth 25 dollars when i first started, and by the time I quit it you were lucky to find a buyer willing to pay 5.

Read full topic

item.title: Neopets
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

Some Sony Ericssons are delivered with Neopets, my earlier Sony Ericsson W300 was delivered with NP. I didn’t like it though.

Read full topic

item.title: Neopets
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

mmm, i remember back in the days when COdestones had just come out, and Fairy’s where so cheap that i was giving them away…

My theme park was raking in alot of Neopoints, and i had just achieved a Gold Trophy on there newest game, Kiko Match. And was contemplating adopting a 2nd pet, Macy Grey.

SPending over 100,000 neopoints once a week on ‘Strange Potions’ because the Strange Lab kept changing my Quiggle into a girl…

Squigglyo the Quiggle would have pwnd you all if the account was wiped for some reason… :’( he shall be missed

Interested Fact: That Quiggle is where i made the name Squigglyo from… about 10 years ago now…

Read full topic
